title: vancouver museum logo
content:
anybody know what the typefaces are?

my guesses:

VANCOUVER  
- i have no idea. i was thinking maybe its a version of frutiger from some obscure foundry.  
- the top extension of the ‘E’ has an angle on it that is really throwing me off.

museum:  
- it looks like bodoni to me but the top serif stems are off. is this a bodoni that somebody tried to customize?

Can anybody shed some light on this for me?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [vancouver\_museum.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20060719212800/http:/typophile.com/files/vancouver_museum.jpg) | 104.4 KB |
author: Kenny Bania

comments.content: VANCOUVER is the FF Kievit by Dutch Michael Abbink.
The E is like meta, but meta seems more condensed
Darn, but I was close… wasn’t I? :)
